access-token.description: The Mixcloud API OAuth2 access token to use. Will take precedence over client-id and client-secret.

client-id.description: The Mixcloud API OAuth2 client id to use.

client-secret.description: The Mixcloud API OAuth2 client secret to use.

additionalProperties.description: A preset for an uploaded mix.

name.description: A name pattern in the form of a regular expression that may capture a single number describing the index/number of the mix.

artwork.description: A file path to the cover art for the uploaded mix.

tags.description: A list of tags for the upload.
